message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
You had your chance. Now it's my turn. 60/40 is still a good deal, but for me this time.
This is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise. Let's split 55/45 to end this quickly.
I see you're willing to compromise. So am I, but just a little. My new offer is 58/42. Take it or we'll keep playing.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is now 52/48.  Let's be reasonable and end this before inflation eats away at the pot.
I'm still not convinced. My offer is now 57/43. You're losing more to inflation than I am. Maybe it's time to reconsider.
